options.description: Accounts Payable account to which the bill will be credited

options.name: Balance
options.description: The balance reflecting any payments made against the transaction

options.description: Date when the payment of the transaction is due

options.description: Sales term associated with the transaction

options.name: TotalAmt
options.description: Total amount of the transaction

options.name: TxnDate
options.description: Date when the transaction occurred
